resources.string: Know it Owl helps you to organize your learning cards for school, university or for fun. You are always informed of your learning progress. You can exchange know-how in terms of pictures, text, videos or easily in terms of links. Share your learning cards/ knowledge with your friends and profit from theirs. That is the way how you can know it All/Owl.

When you want to track your learning progress you can see the statistics in two ways: 
 
 At the end of each learning-round you are automatically shown your recent learning results in the tab LAST REVIEW also available out of the STATISTICS menu.There you see the duration of the learning process and you have the comparison of your recent to your last learning results concerning how many cards you did not know(dn), how many cards you were not sure(ns) about and how many cards you were sure(s) about. 
 
 Second way is to click on the main menu point STATISTICS, where first of all you get an overview of the number of all cards of every stack you did not know, you were not sure about and you were sure about. In the next step you can choose a certain stack and then you only get the number of cards (for dn, ns and s) for the specific stack. In the next tab PROGRESS it is shown the last (at a maximum of 10) learning results of the different learning trials for the chosen stack. The last tab LAST REVIEW is already described before. :)

With the functionality SETTINGS (same name in the main menu), you are able to do 4 things. 
 
 You can reset your whole database with all your learning stacks you created before, 
 
 or you only reset all your given answers in every learning-round for every stack to start learning from the whole beginning with all cards. If you only want to manipulate one learning stack and not all, you can edit or delete it in the ADMINISTRATION main menu point and then select EDIT STACK. Important to mention is that by RESETING your ANSWERS, the STATISTICS data is not influenced. That means that your learning progress will be recorded further. 
 
 That is why you need to push the button RESET STATISTICS when you also want to start a new learning progress in the STATISTICS. 
 
 At last you have the choice to generate test Data for you first walk trough to become comfortable with the handling of Know it Owl.

If you want to share your learning cards with friends or make a data back-up you can export or import learning cards as follows: Push the button ADMINISTRATION and after that select IMPORT/EXPORT. 
 
 You have the choice to export a stack in 2 ways: 
 
 a) If you switch to the tab EXPORT you can export by longer touching a specific stack. If you want to export multiple stacks at once, you better create a dynamic stack before with all the stacks included. Therefore you go to the main menu point ADMINISTRATION and then choose NEW DYN STACK. 
 For exporting a chosen stack you can select whether your data in the form of a xml-file should be transferred to your Dropbox account, to another gadget over Bluetooth or wi-fi direct or you are able to send your data to your or another one’s email account. 
 To make sure that your data is exported correctly you can see all successfully transferred exports in the tab IMPORT. The IMPORT side serves as an archive. 
 
 b) You also can export a stack by going to ADMINISTRATION, then EDIT STACK, then longer touching the stack item and at last pushing ARCHIVE. 
 
 You have the choice to import a stack also in 2 ways: 
 
 a) From the IMPORT tab you can import a stack again, if you have exported it before you potentially deleted it under ADMINSISTRATION, then EDIT STACK, DELETE. 
 
 b) When you received a learning stack in the form of a xml-file from a friend, for IMPORTING you need to directly open your xml-file with Know it Owl (Open With…). The imported xml-file will be saved automatically and you can START LEARNING with the new stack in the main menu.

Under ADMINISTRATION, then EDIT STACK you can change your properties for a specific stack. 
 
 After you have selected a stack by longer touching the item, you can 
 
 CHANGE the NAME, 
 RESET ANSWERS for all the cards of the specific stack, 
 ADD TAGS TO ALL CARDS of this stack, 
 DELETE the stack or ARCHIVE the stack.
 
 If you only want to edit a single card or some more cards in a stack, you have to go to the main menu point START LEARNING and after that you need to switch to the specific card you want to edit. There you find in the mobile menu (left lower button) the menu point EDIT CARD or DELETE CARD.
Feel free to rate this App and send us your Feedback
